title.rendered: Conversations on Outreach for Graduating Seniors

content.rendered:
This webinar was part of the 2020 Handshake Access Summer Series.

Panelists include Junior Delgado, Director of the Career Center & Employer Relations at Westfield State University, and Jose Diaz Aquino, Assistant Director of Career Programming at Northern Arizona University.

View more career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: A panel discussion on best practices, tools to employ in Handshake, and how to connect most with this demographic.
